Package service

Class BookService

java.lang.Object
service.BookService
public class BookService extends Object
Service class responsible for book-related operations such as adding books, retrieving all books, and searching books by title, author, or ISBN.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Library Management System

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BookService()
    Constructs a BookService instance and initializes required database tables.

  • Constructor Details

    • BookService

      public BookService()
      Constructs a BookService instance and initializes required database tables.

  • Method Details

    • addBook

      public Book addBook(String title, String author, String isbn)
      Adds a new book to the system.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book.
      author - The author of the book.
      isbn - The ISBN of the book.
      Returns:
      A Book object representing the newly added book, or null if the operation fails.

    • getAllBooks

      public List<Book> getAllBooks()
      Retrieves all books stored in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all Book objects.

    • searchBooks

      public List<Book> searchBooks(String searchTerm, String searchType)
      Searches for books based on a provided search term and search type.
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - The keyword to search for.
      searchType - The type of search: "title", "author", or "isbn".
      Returns:
      A list of books matching the search criteria.
